entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 28. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
